useful_title: The Challenge of Human Induced Climate Change Transitioning to a Post Fossil Fuel Future
best_gem_comment: Great class to take for gened. Lectures are a bit boring but try to stay attentive and take notes for the weeks before the midterm. The midterm exam definitely requires preparation – adequately study for that. Final project and presentation super easy and low stakes. Overall definitely a gem – recommend.
This class is definitely a gem. There is some pretty annoying busy work (especially later in the semester), but it is very chill throughout!
best_gem_comment_short: This class is definitely a gem.

best_gem_comment: Sleep is no longer a gem, but it is totally manageable as long as you do the readings (which are pretty short anyway) and pay attention inlecture. Much (maybe most) of the things you learn are immediately relevant to your everyday life, so that’s a plus. All in all—great course, and highly recommend if you still need to fulfill your science Gen Ed requirement.
best_gem_comment_short: Sleep is no longer a gem, but it is totally manageable as long as you do the readings (which are pretty short anyway) and pay attention inlecture.

useful_title: Human Trafficking, Slavery and Abolition in the Modern World
best_gem_comment: This is definitely a gem. Very little work, week to week, and the midterm is easy. The final paper and final exam were also not too bad. Lectures are repetitive and boring, but I found section quite worthwhile and engaging.

useful_title: Prediction The Past and Present of the Future
best_gem_comment: This is a great class and work–wise is a gem! Lectures are long, so be prepared to pay attention for 3 hours, but otherwise it's well–run and I really enjoyed learning about both the science/data and history of prediction!
best_gem_comment_short: This is a great class and work–wise is a gem!
